import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import $ from "jquery"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import Sidebar from "./common/Sidebar"; export class SingleHome extends Component { componentDidMount() { var id = window.location.href.split('/')[window.location.href.split('/').length - 1]; // console.log(id); axios .get(`${axios.defaults.baseURL}/view-home/${id}`) .then(response => { console.log(response); return response; }) .then(json => { if (json.data.success) { this.setState({ post: json.data.home, }); } else{ console.log(`Cannot fetch data!`) }; }) .catch(error => { console.error(`An Error Occured! ${error}`); }); }; render() { return (
Back to Homes Listing

{home.name}

HomeVest! House ownership simplified

Name on Document
Number of Units
); } } export default SingleHome;
